name: Dr. Emily Carter
title: Lead Veterinarian
bio: Dr. Carter graduated from Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine and has a passion for preventive care and emergency surgery.

name: Dr. Michael Rodriguez
title: Exotic Animal Specialist
bio: With expertise in non-traditional pets, Dr. Rodriguez ensures exotic animals receive tailored, high-quality treatment.

name: Dr. Sarah Lee
title: Chief of Staff
bio: Dr. Lee focuses on skin conditions and holistic wellness plans to keep your pets healthy year-round.
